reviews.review:
Это легенда. Классика. Играем, значит, за ученого по имени Гордон Фримен, который работает в секретном исследовательском комплексе. В результате неудачного эксперимента в комплекс вторгаются пришельцы, а Фримен хватает ломик в руки и прокладывает себе путь через весь комплекс.

Плюсы:
-Интересный сюжет
-Много оружия
-Много видов врагов
-Мультиплеер
-Динамичный саундрек
-Атмосферно

Минусы:
-Ученые и охранники наравятся застрять в любом дверном проеме.
-Слишком долгая поездка на поезде в начале, можно сходить чаю попить)

В целом просто замечательная игра. Советую играть без HD моделек. Какие-то они не доработанные, особенно у охранников рот не проработан))
This is a great game. Give it a little time to grab you and trust me, it will be worth it.

Shooter en primera persona con plataformeo y puzzles sin secuencias de video y que aun así logra adentrarte en una historia profunda y enigmática la cual dispone de herramientas de narrativa visual que uno mismo como jugador tendra que desenlazar para comprender el significado.

- uno de los mejores juegos de la historia y que posiblemente jamas sera superado.
Что мне сказать.Игра старая-но великая.10 ИЗ 10 гейбов.Пусть игра живёт и процветает.

Es el juego con el mejor diseño de niveles que he visto hasta la fecha, no se hace repetitivo ya que no son simples tiroteos, ofrece muchas posibilidades y explota distintas mecanicas lo que lo hace un juegazo. 

10/10
jumped into the bosses head and he died. 11/10

Even though this game was released in 1998, it is still one of the greatest games I have ever played. If you are thinking about getting it, just get it and play it. The first few hours are hard to get through, and took me quite a while, but once you are passed the first 4 hours or so, you won't want to stop playing.
pretty great

Qua fare una recensione sensata per me in questo caso è a dir poco sprecata...
Il gioco per me parla da solo... chiamarlo solo "capolavoro" è molto poco riduttivo...
è molto di più... io la considero come una "esperienza" da fare non solo almeno una volta nella vita di ogni videogiocatore, ma anche a tutti, a prescindere se ti piace il genere o meno.
Tutto avviene in tempo reale, senza intro e soluzione di continuità attraverso filmati pre-caricati,
l'immersione è totale perchè è solo in prima persona... e il bello è che Valve è partita con il botto, anzi, superbotto già dal primo gioco... grafica, sonoro, trama ricca di misteri, gameplay martellante a presa diretta senza schermate di caricamento... l'essenza del videogioco.
Il multiplayer, ancora oggi è abbastanza popolato e le mod in questo gioco sono tantissime.
Se non lo avete giocato, vi ordino tassativamente di farlo!!!!!
P.S.: E non dico altro, anzi, una piccola nota: Il doppiaggio in italiano è fatto abbastanza bene.

First played Half Life in... 2002 or 2001, I know it was before Half Life 2 was released, that I'm certain of. I was about 10 years old at the time, and the only game I remember playing before Half Life was Super Mario on the NES. I cheated through the game because I was a just stupid kid, playing a game I which disc I borrowed from a friend. I do remember being scared by the first zombie you see after climbing the elevator shaft in the begining. Man, wish I could forget ever playing this game so I could enjoy it freshly today. 

What? Review? Oh, um... It's a classic? You should have this in your Steam inventory just because. Heck, I wouldn't be surprised if Valve won't start handing out this game together with Steam.

Pros:
- The sound detail is amazing
- The visuals are stunning for the time it was made
- I got the Brutal Half-Life mod which mad everything more bloody and difficult
- There was such a huge variety of weapons to choose from
- I got to blow up a helicopter with a laser gun
Cons:
- The Vorts do 50 health damage each hit 
- The final boss is a pain in the ass to kill
- Made me jump out of my chair more than once

If you like older shooters and for some reason have never bought this buy it now!!!

Okay...
Half Life. Uno de los mejores shooters antes y ahora, un parteaguas en la historia de los videojuegos, con una jugabilidad excepcional y una historia maravillosa, segun las criticas de millones de personas.
He jugado muchisimos juegos de la epoca, y si, es revolucionaria la manera en la que cambian la jugabilidad por completo, porque aunque desactualizada, se siente como un FPS moderno, sin contar los graficos.

Muchisimas armas, una historia enredada y misteriosa, que realmente te pone a pensar.
Muy buena jugabilidad, MUY buen sonido, buenos graficos para la epoca... 
Un MUY buen juego :D

Marines, teman a mis alienigenas arrojadizos!
its alright

Niesamowita. Gra tak stara, jak grywalna. Prawdziwy przełom w stosunku do FPS'ów sprzed 1998. Bez niej nie byłoby Counter Strike'a, L4D czy Portala. Nie byłoby nawet Steama.
Jedyną rzeczą przeszkadzającą jest trudność znalezienia odpowiedniej drogi i sekwencje platformowe. Śą one tak niesamowicie męczące, że przed każdą z nich trzeba zapisać grę i przechodzi się ją dopiero za którymś podejściem. Ale to mały minus. Jeśli jest ktoś, kto w nią jeszcze nie grał, musi spróbować.

Selbst nach so vielen Jahren immernoch ein geniales Spiel!Viel Spielsaß mit atemberaubender Atmosphäre, genialen Gameplay, schöner Grafik (auch wenn sie alt ist sieht sie ziemlich gut aus) und vielen kleinen Details, z.B. die Houndeyes, die einschlafen oder VOX der nach einiger Zeit genervt wird. Auch der Weg, die Story zu erzählen, ist toll. Man sieht alles nur aus den Augen von Gordon Freeman und kann sich immer bewegen. Definitiv empfohlen für alle Fans von First Person Shootern und auch Neulingen des Genres empfehle ich es sehr.
The Epic FPS.. Recommended fr dose who love science fiction and wonder to live in such a world.. Amazing Graphics fr a 1998 game.. HATS OFF !!

Je vais peut-être me faire incendier, mais j'ai vraiment beaucoup de mal avec ce jeu. Pour l'époque, c'est beau, c'est rapide, c'est jouissif. Mais c'est peut-être parce que je suis un petit con de 20 ans habitué aux FPS des années 2000 et 2010 que je trouve Half-Life CHIANT.

Pour moi, la scène d'intro, aussi intéressante soit-elle, résume en partie le problème que j'ai avec ce jeu : Je le trouve inutilement lent et chiant. Les couloirs sont longs et répétitifs à en pleurer. Pourtant le scénario est intéressant, mais rien y fait, j'accroche pas. Je préfère Black Mesa... Ca paraît con dit comme ça étant donné que c'est une refonte totale d'Half-Life avec le Source Engine, mais c'est le cas.

Je le recommande quand même car il est a l'origine des codes du FPS des années 2000 et 2010 et que si vous êtes un passionné de jeux vidéo, il vous faut la base de ces mêmes codes. N'oublions pas aussi que ce jeu est la base du génialissime Counter-Strike !
Terrible Graphics Yes EPIC game YYES Should You Buy It TOTALLY

This game hasn't aged all too well but I still think it's pretty fun. Certainly a classic. If you can't get behind its ancient visual style, I'd suggest playing the fan remake Black Mesa. It's not 100% done at the time of this review though, so... your call.


You probably want my opinion on THIS version of the game though, huh?

If you're looking for a fairly tough shooter with lots of platforming segments, this is the game for you. It's also the first installment in the Half Life series, which you'll probably want to play if you want the full story.

Honestly, I don't know what I've got to say about this game. It's certainly not as unique as Half Life 2 but I still think it's one of the best games of its era and I had lots of fun playing it, so maybe you will too. Give it a shot!

Half-life (t1⁄2) is the amount of time required for a quantity to fall to half its value as measured at the beginning of the time period, this game has a half life of forever in relevance to the game industry and is still the king of shooters even today

Que viciada que me pege con este juego, por su jugabilidad, por su historia, por sus graficos por la epoca, por su secuela que tambien fue fantastica y luego de jugarla acá en steam la jugare y la analizare, por sus mods, como el Counter, entre otros, que son obras de arte dentro de otras obras de arte. Simplemente FANTASTICO.

I remember playing this game on the PS2 and PC as a kid. Those headcrab zombies scared me, and I felt sorry for the scientists in the elevator who fell to their deaths. I used cheat codes because I sucked at it.

This game was apparently legendary or something. Changed the state of FPSes, I heard. Very atmospheric... in the 90s.

It has not aged well. The textures and level design are very primitive and bare, and its platforming sections have fallen out of favor. The zombies are now just crowbar targets to me, and I've become apathetic towards the scientists and their cheesy deaths.


But I finished it. Legitimately.


It felt good.


I wanted more. 

And that is why I waited for Half-Life 2.

And that is why I'm waiting for Half-Life 3.

At the end of the game, you [Insert spoilers here]. Then, you [Insert more spoilers here].

Really though, it's too good. May probably be the best game you've ever played. You'll get at least 16 hours out of finishing the game once. Then you can beat it again. And then you can beat it on HARD. And then you can try multiplayer. But it's the main story that's good, not the multiplayer.

In this game you make decisions you wouldn't usually think to make, sometimes even stuck in a place trying to figure out what to do, when the answer was right in front of your face the entire time. You may have to flick a lever hiding on the wall to advance that you didn't notice, or climb a seemingly cosmetic rim along the side of a window, then jump to a ladder at the end of it. You really must think and depend on your skills of instincts and survival to play this game, it is definately not for the dumb-minded, simple person.

I give it a full rating of 10 outta ten, like EVERYONE ELSE HAS! WORTH A BUY!

The original Half-Life. The features in the game are as follows!

-Confusing map design! But pretend you know what you are doing because this game is a gem and it is impossible for there to be any flaws!

-Weapons! They shoot and blowup your adversaries! You of course get the crowbar to beatup the headcrabs that used to scare the shit out of you but you totally aren't scared of them now (you are)

-Story! Experience soilders being assholes and a man in a suit fixing his tie and walk away! But before that take a long train ride, help a man get toilet paper and look in your locker and see a picture of your pixelated family!

-Graphics! Experiance breathtaking graphics that used to be the Bee's knees!

-Gameplay! Have fun with the good ol' OH SHIT MY HEALTH IS LOW BETTER SAVE EVERY 5 SECONDS I AINT REDOING THAT AGAIN! OH MY GOD THANKYOU MEDIC STATION!

Overall it is a game that = fun give it a try

If you don't, hide people are hunting your head

Yeah it's pretty good. but warning, if you try widescreen, it might mess up the game so I suggest keeping the default options
what happened to the other half?

Played this game 16 years after its release. No surprise that people are saying Half-Life gave direction to the FPS genre back then. A classic, no 'big giant arrow' on top of the screen to guide you to the next destination, yet it was intuitive and the game flowed smoothly. 

The developers came up with a Source edition that comes with updated graphics a few years back to keep up with current gaming standards. However, a classic is a classic, and you can't go wrong with a game that has 97% positive reviews. I would say get this game on a discount and have fun!

Still waiting on a discount for The Orange Box!
10/10 would throw all Snarks in Nihilanth's head to instagib it again

Tato skvělá rychlá akční hra mě opravdu bavila.Ze začátku jedete nějakym autobusem,až někam do nějaky základny.Kde konečně po rozbití portálu začíná dlouhá cesta.Je zde spoustu druhu zbraní a nepřátel.Neni to lineární hra,protože se můžete vracet z levelu do levelu.Někdy musíte vymyslet jak se dostat dál přes nějakou překážku,ale neni to že byste na to přicházely celý den.Příběh této hry je jednoduchý,ale po prvním díle je to ještě málo co o něm vědět.Ovládání je dobré a rychlé bez zasekání nebo bez nějakyho vloudiliho spomalení.Chůze je taky dobrá,až na to že když jdete rovně a zastavíte tak si jako kloužete což je asi jediná věc co mi vadila jinak sem nenašel žádný kritycky chyby.
